title: HUGE!!! NativeTwitch Update
mainfeature: Complete UI / UX Overhaul, Read Release Notes

image.title: App UI / UX Got HUGE Update
image.description: The app will now stay in your menu bar, stay hidden and use almost no resources

image.title: Secure AF
image.description:
NOTE: You will need to re-enter ClientID, AccessToken, All settings have been reset.
The app now saves your oauth token and client ID in keychain instead of Storing it in a 'file'

image.title: New ICON
image.description: The app icon is changed! Looks better than a blob imo.
